info.title: Re3gistry2 API
info.description: Welcome to the Re3gistry2 Swagger API interactive documentation. In this tool you will be able to try and interact with the different endpoints and API procedures of the application. For a deeper understanding on the behaviour of the API and how to use it you can consult the different documentation manuals. Any issues and questions can be reported in the Re3gistry2 GitHub repository.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language that content is returned in

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Acceptance status of the returned Items
